item.title: One group of stocks is showing it could be resistant to the global macro worries: Sports betting
item.description: "Sports betting has slowly been outperforming the S&P 500," JC O'Hara, chief technical strategist at Roth Capital Partners, wrote in a note to clients...

item.title: Katie Stockton says bitcoin could rally further if it surpasses this key level
item.description: The chart analyst analyzes bitcoin and ether.

item.title: Apple shares to tumble nearly 30% as earnings take tariff hit, Moffett Nathanson predicts
item.description: "There are no easy answers here. Apple is inextricably tied to opposing forces at the center of the trade tensions," the Wall Street researcher said.

item.title: This AI-focused health stock is a buy that can rally nearly 50%, BTIG says
item.description: Analyst Mark Massaro initiated coverage on the stock with a buy rating.

item.title: Expect a ‘severe’ market reaction if Trump tries to fire Powell, says Evercore ISI’s Krishna Guha
item.description: The comments come after President Donald Trump criticized Jerome Powell again on Friday, calling for the central banker to lower interest rates.
